name.en: Selective Literature Reading and Data Processing

department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

goal.en: This course introduces students to a basic form of communication vital to their success as researchers: preparing a manuscript for publication in a peer-reviewed archival journal. Students will learn about the origins of scientific writing, research methods, ways to improve their writing style, and how to become an efficient writer, and as a result, should be motivated to write more.
goal.ch: 本課程提供學生介紹閱讀科學文獻及數據處理方式, 使學生對於未來撰寫學術文章的架構建立基礎之概念, 進而介紹學術發表中常見之型式, 例如期刊論文, 口頭報告, 海報製備以及個人履歷等四種面向介紹其架構

content.en:
1. Introduction of scientific tools
2. Criteria for being good scientists and scientific paper
3. Preparation of the manuscript
4. Preparation of oral presentation
5. Preparation of poster
6. Preparation of Resume and CV
content.ch:
1. 文獻選讀及數據處理之工具介紹
2. 科學報告撰寫之要素
3. 期刊論文架構準備
4. 口頭報告架構準備
5. 海報架構準備
6. 履歷及簡歷架構介紹

textbook.en: Glasman-Deal, Hilary. Science Research Writing for Non-Native Speakers of English. London: Imperial College Press, 2010.

grading.ch: 1. 期中報告: 40％ 2. 期末口頭報告: 60％
